content.text: Michael: Holly and I are like Romeo and Juliet, and the office is like the dragon that kept them apart.
Erin: So tell me about your new girlfriend.
Andy: She's neat. I met her at Darryl's cousin's party. We were the only two white people there.
Dwight: I have had intercourse in the office.
Dwight: As has Ryan, as has Kelly, as has Meredith, as has Phyllis, as has Darryl, as has Creed, as has Michael and as has Holly!
Kevin: She goes to another school.
Ryan: Anybody can be Prince Charming one day a year, with the dinner and the flowers and all that, but you know what impresses me? When a guy can do that no days a year
